--- title: "교과서 챕터 8" author: "yongraegod" date: "2024-07-22" categories: [bigdata] --- ![](damgom5.jpg) ## 빈도 막대 그래프 그리기 - 데이터 불러오기 ::: {#2d0a2b64 .cell execution_count=1} ``` {.python .cell-code} import pandas as pd mpg = pd.read_csv('C:/Users/USER/Documents/LS빅데이터스쿨/lsbigdata-project1/data/mpg.csv') mpg.head() mpg.shape ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=16} ``` (234, 11) ``` ::: ::: - Seaborn 패키지 불러오기 ::: {#1e150909 .cell execution_count=2} ``` {.python .cell-code} !pip install seaborn !pip install plotly.express import seaborn as sns import matplotlib.pyplot as plt import plotly.express as px ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Requirement already satisfied: seaborn in c:\ds\python\python312\lib\site-packages (0.13.2) Requirement already available: 24.0 -> 24.1.2 [notice] To update, run: python.exe -m pip install --upgrade pip [notice] A new release of pip is available: 24.0 -> 24.1.2 [notice] To update, run: python.exe -m pip install --upgrade pip ``` ::: ::: ### `scatter()` 사용하기 - seaborn을 사용한 산점도 ::: {#f2cf954c .cell execution_count=3} ``` {.python .cell-code} sns.scatterplot(data=mpg, x="displ", y="hwy", hue="drv") \ .set(xlim = [3,6], ylim = [10,30]) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](index_files/figure-html/cell-4-output-1.png){width=608 height=434} ::: :::
- plotly를 사용한 산점도 ::: {#0d1b89e5 .cell execution_count=4} ``` {.python .cell-code} px.scatter(data_frame = mpg, x='displ', y='hwy', color='drv') ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ### `barplot()` 사용하기 - 데이터 전처리 ::: {#24dbf3a5 .cell execution_count=5} ``` {.python .cell-code} df_mpg = mpg.groupby("drv", as_index = False) \ .agg(mean_hwy = ('hwy','mean')) df_mpg ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=20} ```{=html}
drv mean_hwy
0 4 19.174757
1 f 28.160377
2 r 21.000000
``` ::: :::
- 그래프로 표현 ::: {#83fe5c45 .cell execution_count=6} ``` {.python .cell-code} sns.barplot(data = df_mpg.sort_values("mean_hwy", ascending = False), x = 'drv', y = 'mean_hwy', hue = 'drv') ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](index_files/figure-html/cell-7-output-1.png){width=585 height=429} ::: ::: --- ### p.318 `px.bar()`를 이용한 막대 그래프 만들기 - 자동차 종류별 빈도 구하기 ::: {#a1d04a2c .cell execution_count=7} ``` {.python .cell-code} df = mpg.groupby('category', as_index = False) \ .agg(n = ('category', 'count')) df ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=22} ```{=html}
category n
0 2seater 5
1 compact 47
2 midsize 41
3 minivan 11
4 pickup 33
5 subcompact 35
6 suv 62
``` ::: :::
- 막대 그래프 만들기 ::: {#f813aea8 .cell execution_count=8} ``` {.python .cell-code} px.bar(data_frame = df, x = 'category', y = 'n', color = 'category') ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: --- ### p.319 `px.line()`를 이용한 선 그래프 만들기 - economics 불러오기 ::: {#2600836c .cell execution_count=9} ``` {.python .cell-code} economics = pd.read_csv('C:/Users/USER/Documents/LS빅데이터스쿨/lsbigdata-project1/data/economics.csv') ``` :::
- 선 그래프 만들기 ::: {#e8e12e5a .cell execution_count=10} ``` {.python .cell-code} px.line(data_frame = economics, x = 'date', y = 'psavert') ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: :::

<script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/jquery/3.5.1/jquery.min.js" integrity="sha512-bLT0Qm9VnAYZDflyKcBaQ2gg0hSYNQrJ8RilYldYQ1FxQYoCLtUjuuRuZo+fjqhx/qtq/1itJ0C2ejDxltZVFg==" crossorigin="anonymous" data-relocate-top="true"></script>
<script type="application/javascript">define('jquery', [],function() {return window.jQuery;})</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
window.PlotlyConfig = {MathJaxConfig: 'local'};
if (window.MathJax && window.MathJax.Hub && window.MathJax.Hub.Config) {window.MathJax.Hub.Config({SVG: {font: "STIX-Web"}});}
if (typeof require !== 'undefined') {
require.undef("plotly");
requirejs.config({
    paths: {
        'plotly': ['https://cdn.plot.ly/plotly-2.32.0.min']
    }
});
require(['plotly'], function(Plotly) {
    window._Plotly = Plotly;
});
}
</script>
